info.name: LatexTex Editor and Compiler
info.description:
Simple LaTex editor and compiler depend on files_texteditor. ALPHA VERSION.
This Version can:
- Add LaTeX button to normal text editor in OwnCloud 8.2.2
- Call the compile Dialog
- Compiling latex and writing the output to clouds filesystem
- Preview the PDF by using 'ViewPDF' button
This Version can NOT:
- Update OwnCloud FileCache --> You compiled latex, you got a PDF, this pdf is basicly on your filesystem, but you can't see it. Never the less you can download it.
info.author: Arman Khalatyan, Alexander Agasiev
